data.event: The first settler arrived around 1772, but many new families moved in after the American Revolution.

event.title: 1803, the town of Cairo was formed

data.event: In 1803, the town of Cairo was formed from the towns of Catskill, Coxsackie, and Durham.
Formerly known as Canton, the town's name was changed in 1808 to Cairo.

event.title: 1800 the Susquehannah Turnpike, a private toll road, ran

data.event: From 1800 the Susquehannah Turnpike, a private toll road, ran through the town.
